message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $120. I think you'll find it's a steal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we split the difference and do $105?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me there?
